snippet: Two recent accidents, one of them fatal, involving commercial rockets have underscored the high risks and soaring costs involved in any spaceflight.
abstract: Two recent accidents involving commercial rockets, one of them fatal, have underscored the high risks and soaring costs involved in any spaceflight; unrelated accidents involving Virgin Galactic space plan and Orbital Sciences rocket explosion are stark reminders that path to space is just as arduous for private companies as it is for government-funded programs.
lead_paragraph: Two recent accidents, one of them fatal, involving commercial rockets have underscored the high risks and soaring costs involved in any spaceflight.

headline.seo: Accidents at Virgin Galactic and Orbital Sciences Show Hurdles for Private Space Efforts
headline.main: In Traveling to the Stars, Risk and Cost
headline.print_headline: In Traveling to the Stars, Risk and Cost
